studyMetadata.title: Combined Study - Demographics & Visualization Literacy
studyMetadata.description: A study consisting of a demographic questionnaire and a visualization literacy assessment focused on glucose data.

glucoseLineChart.description: Line chart stimulus for glucose aggregation data

response.prompt: What is the highest level of education you have attained?
Which of the following best describes your current diabetes-related health status?
options: I have been diagnosed as pre-diabetic

response.prompt: How do you track your glucose data? (Select all that apply)
options: I do not track my glucose

response.prompt: How often do you review your glucose data or reports?
Please type your initials below to confirm consent for the visualization assessment.
Please rate your agreement with the following statements about this visualization:
questionOptions: During a discussion with my clinician, it would be obvious to me how to read this visualization.
During my appointment, I would easily understand how the data is represented in this visualization.
During conversations with my clinician, I would easily understand this visualization.
When reviewing this visualization with my clinician, I would not find it messy.
When reviewing this visualization with my clinician, I would not find it crowded.
When discussing this visualization with my clinician, I would not find distracting parts in it.
When talking with my clinician, I would be able to easily find specific elements in this visualization.
During a clinical discussion, I would easily identify the relevant information in this visualization.
During my appointment, I would easily retrieve information from this visualization.
When reviewing this visualization with my clinician, I would find important data features visible.
During discussions with my clinician, I would clearly see important data features in this visualization.
